props.description: Change the visual style of the button.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Disables the button, disallowing user interaction.
props.title: disabled

props.description: Width of the skeleton. Useful when the skeleton is inside an inline element with no width of its own.
props.title: width

props.description: This is an attribute used to identify a DOM node for testing purposes.
props.title: data-testid
